resources.string: To add a new cue, first click the image on the left then follow the prompt to add a new Image. You will then be sent to the cue configuration screen.

Welcome to VisualCues, to get started press Add Cue on your left to add a new cue from either the camera, or downloads directory.


	If you would like to use images from outside the application, first email them to yourself then download them from your email. They will then be available in the downloads gallery which can be accessed from the Add Cue button.

	Hope you enjoy.
Press and hold a cue to change its settings.
Select from one to three Cues.
